org.franca.core.franca

Interface FBroadcast

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, FModelElement, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FBroadcastImpl

    public interface FBroadcast
extends FModelElement
    A representation of the model object 'FBroadcast'. The definition of a Franca broadcast as part of an FInterface. See the Franca IDL chapter in the Franca User Guide for very detailed information on broadcast semantics.

    The following features are supported:

    • Out Args
    • Selective
    • Selector

    See Also:
    FrancaPackage.getFBroadcast()
